Intuitive
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Intuitive
By Dreiz on Thursday, February 28, 2002 - 07:03 pm:

Please, if anyone has any information on how to get the characteristic, intuitive, let me know.

By AgMasamu on Thursday, February 28, 2002 - 08:47 pm:

IIRC, I had a Suezo get it when he evolved to a Morx sub...

By Dreiz on Thursday, February 28, 2002 - 08:55 pm:

Any special way way you remember training it? And what foods did you feed it?

By AgMasamu on Thursday, February 28, 2002 - 09:14 pm:

I didn't use any special training method. I was alternating between Speed and Intelligence training, drilling until it "looked healthy", and fed it Nuts and Morx Mushrooms, mainly. I'm pretty sure it was the growth spurt that caused the characteristics change, not the evolution.

By Dreiz on Friday, March 1, 2002 - 01:47 pm:

In your encyclopedia does the tanuzo have intuitive?

By Tigerbubble on Friday, March 1, 2002 - 04:21 pm:

Agmasamu- have you noticed intuitive on any other monsters that you raised to be high in intelligence? I wonder if maybe the trait is connected to a monster that is high in intelligence. I have never raised a monster to be high in intelligence and i have never had a monster that aquired intuitive.

By AgMasamu on Friday, March 1, 2002 - 08:50 pm:

I checked my encyclopedia. My Suezo/Morx has Sharp Eyes and Quiet for it's characteristics.

I doubt Intuitive is directly linked to Intelligence. I think I may have raised a Pixie that gained it during a growth spurt, but I'm sure it's just a coincidence. I'm going to work on some Pow. based monsters and see if I can get it to learn that characteristic.

Between determining the max number of characteristics and trying to find a way to get Intuitive....

By AgMasamu on Friday, March 1, 2002 - 10:18 pm:

While looking at legendcup.com, I realizes that Torey Luvello raised a Color Pandora which was Power-based, and it has Intuitive on it. This helps show that Intuitive isn't linked to Intelligence, since CC had only 10 Int....

Of course, this doesn't exactly prove much, because I don't know how CC was raised, if it started with it, etc....

By torey_luvullo on Saturday, March 2, 2002 - 06:20 am:

cc did not start with intuitive. he was raised as follows:
1] always fed the 4 nutrition food - rotation of mushroom/peach, nuts, and vine grass. i chose this cp especially because he liked vine grass 2 and i didnt want to have to worry about fatness - in fact, he became slim.
2] almost never battled. battle sense remained E.
3] used the psych0midget/gamefaqs idea of raising in categories so as to take one down to 1, and then train in the drills that took advantage of the fact that you lost nothing in that category[int] when doing so.
4] used the "partial digmoshmogi" turnaround at light of earth time - that is, i reset until i got a refreshing item, so that i could double up on hard drills before and after the venture.

unfortunately, all this info has no punchline so far as intuitive is concerned. i just looked up sometime after the second growth, and "voila" there it was. bottom line - i had no idea how it happened, and i couldnt be sure of reproducing the result if my life depended on it.

By Dreiz on Saturday, March 2, 2002 - 10:38 am:

As a side note: did you know that the darkbringer hengar has 4 in favorites for the vine grass? I found this out when i was evolving a hengar to a darkbringer. My first thought was "Whoa..."

By Dreiz on Saturday, March 2, 2002 - 10:42 am:

Agmasamu, torey, do you remember your monster's personality traits when you had intuitive?

By torey_luvullo on Saturday, March 2, 2002 - 11:19 am:

he started out nice, then went to normal after first growth, then he became bad/unfriendly after the second. the ugly part is, i dont remember whether it was right before or right after that second growth that he got intuitive.

By Tigerbubble on Saturday, March 2, 2002 - 12:52 pm:

Yeah Dreiz, every hengar breed and subbreed i have ever raised had 4,4 for vinegrass and 4,4 for nuts.

I guess i was wrong about intuitive being connected to intelligent. Maybe certain monsters a prone to the trait, because i have never raised a cp, pixie, or suazo and i have never encountered intuitive.
